Name: Arcane Insight
Description: You or another investigator within range gains 1 Clue. Then flip this card.

Name: Bind Monster
Description: Choose a monster within 2 range and test Lore. Then flip this card over and resolve the effect.

Name: Binding
Description: Place a Restraint in a space within range. Then flip this card.

Name: Blood Pact
Description: Choose 1 investigator in your room to heal 1 damage. Then flip this card over, and resolve the effect.

Name: Feed the Mind
Description: You or another investigator within range become Focused. Then flip this card.

Name: Instill Bravery
Description: You or another investigator within range discard 1 Horror. Then flip this card.

Name: Poison Mist
Description: You can attack a monster in an adjacent space with this card.

Name: Shriveling
Description: Choose a monster within 2 range and test Lore - 1. Then flip this card over and resolve the effect.

Name: Soul Pact
Description: Choose 1 investigator in your room to heal 1 horror. Then flip this card over, and resolve the effect.

Name: Spectral Razor
Description: The energy you channel lashes out with deadly precision.

Name: Wither
Description: As the spell takes effect, the victims body withers and mummifies

Name: Wrack
Description: The words of this incanation cause intense, wracking pains to tear at your enemy's body.
